title: Night of Fire
description: Enjoying her widowhood and reluctant to ever marry again, beautiful Lady Cassandra St. Ives engages in a long-distance correspondence with a mysterious and intriguing pen pal, but when he invites her to visit his home, Cassandra finds herself swept off her feet by the dashing Count Basilio Montevarchi, despite his long-standing betrothal to another woman. Original.
author: Barbara Samuel
